section.name: JMAP configuration
section.p: JMAP is intended to be a new standard for email clients to connect to mail stores. It therefore intends to primarily replace IMAP + SMTP submission. It is also designed to be more generic. It does not replace MTA-to-MTA SMTP transmission.
Cassandra Guice proposes a JMAP implementation.

subsection.name: jmap.properties
subsection.p: Consult jmap.properties in GIT to get some examples and hints.
